name: Weather or Not
description:
Weather or Not Beginner's Circle Jam #3 Submission

  AC-1 is a newly discovered planet exhibiting some... unusual behaviour. It seems the weather changes every 10 seconds! We're sending in Unit BCJ-3 to investigate!

  Expect to see hostile lifeforms, tricky platforming, puzzles designed to confound unwanted visitors, and a world that is constantly changing around you.

  Do you accept this mission?
